How can I obtain a sorted [table] of the top 10 longest rivers in India, along with their respective lengths in kilometers and average discharge in cubic meters per second? Also, which river has the highest average discharge and what is its length? Please use the following data:
river <- c("Ganges", "Brahmaputra", "Indus", "Godavari", "Narmada", "Yamuna", "Krishna", "Mahanadi", "Kaveri", "Tapti", "Periyar", "Sutlej", "Beas", "Chenab")
length_km <- c(2525, 2900, 3180, 1465, 1312, 1376, 1400, 858, 760, 724, 244, 1050, 470, 960)
avg_discharge <- c(11500, 7500, 6000, 12950, 9800, 3300, 2580, 1900, 3200, 900, 350, 1200, 420, 1600)
Please provide the necessary [Python code] to obtain the table.

To obtain a sorted table of the top 10 longest rivers in India along with their respective lengths and average discharges, you can use the following Python code. This code will create a DataFrame, sort it by river length, and display the top 10 longest rivers. It will also identify the river with the highest average discharge and its length.

```python
import pandas as pd

# Data
river = ["Ganges", "Brahmaputra", "Indus", "Godavari", "Narmada", "Yamuna", "Krishna", "Mahanadi", "Kaveri", "Tapti", "Periyar", "Sutlej", "Beas", "Chenab"]
length_km = [2525, 2900, 3180, 1465, 1312, 1376, 1400, 858, 760, 724, 244, 1050, 470, 960]
avg_discharge = [11500, 7500, 6000, 12950, 9800, 3300, 2580, 1900, 3200, 900, 350, 1200, 420, 1600]

# Creating a DataFrame
data = {'River': river, 'Length (km)': length_km, 'Average Discharge (m³/s)': avg_discharge}
df = pd.DataFrame(data)

# Sorting by length in descending order
sorted_df = df.sort_values(by='Length (km)', ascending=False)

# Getting the top 10 longest rivers
top_10_longest_rivers = sorted_df.head(10)

# Finding the river with the highest average discharge
highest_discharge_river = df.loc[df['Average Discharge (m³/s)'].idxmax()]

# Display the result
print("Top 10 Longest Rivers in India:")
print(top_10_longest_rivers)

print("\nRiver with the Highest Average Discharge:")
print(highest_discharge_river)
```

This code will display the top 10 longest rivers in India, and it will also show which river has the highest average discharge along with its length.
